item.title: Solved [thanks to everyone who help/tried]
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

[quote=“kihomura, post:6, topic:235615”][quote author=Olzax link=topic=310722.msg2479573#msg2479573 date=1223437861]
Thanks you guys but
dose anyone know code “deleteItem(1050, 1);” for [d d s p 3 c v3] czar i think
[/quote]

For Czar it would be…

deleteItem(1050, GetItemSlot(1050), 1);

thank you

item.title: Solved [thanks to everyone who help/tried]
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

case 169: if (playerHasItem(1050) { deleteItem(1050, 1); openUpBank(); sendMessage("You exchange the Santa hat to open up the bank."); } else { sendMessage("Banking via emote tab cost 1 santa hat!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Solved [thanks to everyone who help/tried]
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“Olzax, post:1, topic:235615”]how would i make it so that if you have a santa in invo it deletes it and opens bank [using santa hat as example / santa hat id = 1050]

case 169:
//if you have a santa hat in invo
//delete one santa hat from invo
openUpBank();
} else {
sendMessage(“Banking via emote tab cost 1 santa hat!”);
}[/quote]

case: #### if (playerHasItem(1050, 1); deleteItem(1050, 1); openUpBank(); } else { sendMessage("You need to pay 1 Santa hat to bank via emote tab."); }

Or something along the lines of that.

If you have a devolution source, the ‘deleteItem’ would work, but if you’re using Czar or something like that, change it to yours.

*Edit oops, one second, changing code so it deletes the item.

Read full topic

item.title: Solved [thanks to everyone who help/tried]
item.dc:creator: @Narubia Narubia
item.description:
@Narubia wrote:

Well, I dont know what case it would go in, but i think it would be something like this

if ((playerHasItemAmount(1050, 1) == false) { sendMessage("Banking via emote tab costs one santa hat!");} else if ((playerHasItemAmount(1050, 1) == true){ openUpBank(); deleteItem(1050, getItemSlot(1050), 1)}

Read full topic

item.title: Solved [thanks to everyone who help/tried]
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

how would i make it so that if you have a santa in invo it deletes it and opens bank [using santa hat as example / santa hat id = 1050]

case 169:
//if you have a santa hat in invo
//delete one santa hat from invo
openUpBank();
} else {
sendMessage(“Banking via emote tab cost 1 santa hat!”);
}
